name: Control Co
description:
Play as Stanley Fubar, recently promoted factory floor manager, and keep the production line in control! Manage tight deadlines, power outages, machine malfunctions, fires and quality control, to keep the controllers flowing out of Control Co!

Features:
  • Gamepad Support
  • 3 Challenge Levels
  • 3 Endless Mode Levels
  • 1 Angry Boss
  • 1 Stanley Fubar!
Controls:

wasd, and mouse or enter
or 
left stick, and triggers or left face button

Made by:

dev_dwarf Zedsquadron Lewmoth
